item.description: Contents Egypt Saudi Qatar Jordan Syria Egypt Ahram One hand protects from the pandemic and the other builds the desert Throughout Egyptian history, Sinai has never received this volume of development projects… The roads, tunnels, and bridges tht are being built will change life across all of Egypt and not just Sinai… I have seen the many giant national projects, which were accomplished by the people of Egypt under the leadership of President Abdel Fattah El-Sisi during the past years, and… I did not believe that all of these projects were completed in this record time

Al-Araby Al-Jadeed Corona Egypt: Doubts about the efficiency of the return-to-work plans The Egyptian government continues to rush towards a full return to service and financial activities after the end of the month of Ramadan, despite the worsening situation of the new Corona epidemic, the steady increase in the number of daily casualties… and the failure of the state to conduct random tests even in areas that witnessed high infection rates.
